oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.common.ui
Class PreferencesBean

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.common.ui.PreferencesBean

public class PreferencesBean
extends java.lang.Object

Preferences Bean to get user preferences at run time for formatting/NLS. Calls through to the oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.common.PreferencesBean class, with the exception of the get/setAccessibilityProfile api's, which include a view-only dependency on the trinidad library.
